=======
Support
=======
Report bugs via the bug tracker on `GitHub <https://github.com/sudo-dakix/pyloan/issues>`__.

=======
License
=======
PyLoan is licensed under the `MIT License <https://github.com/sudo-dakix/pyloan/blob/master/LICENSE>`__.
